name: Oneshot but Bad
description:
A "game" made in 24 hours to try and poorly recreate the starting area of Oneshot. Due to limitations of my knowledge with RPGMaker, for the two item combinations, do the following:

Stick + Alcohol: Interact with the fireplace to get the wet stick.

Wet Stick + "TV": Interact with the "TV" when the wet stick is in your inventory to get the lit stick.
